original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, When a man or woman commits any of the sins that people commit by breaking faith with the Lord, and that person realizes his guilt,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 이르라 남자나 여자나 사람들이 범하는 죄를 범하여 여호와께 거역함으로 죄를 지으면

sentences.original_text: Speak to the people of Israel
When a man or woman commits any of the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 남자나 여자가 어떤 죄를 범했을 때

sentences.original_text: that people commit by breaking faith with the Lord
and that person realizes his guilt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 사람이 자신의 죄를 깨달으면
